title: The Measure Preserving Martingale Sinkhorn Algorithm. (arXiv:2310.13797v1 [q-fin.CP])
abstract: We provide a martingale interpolation between measures that can be obtained by solving a Sinkhorn like system analogous to the one used in Entropic Optimal Transport.
context:
Title: The Measure Preserving Martingale Sinkhorn Algorithm. (arXiv:2310.13797v1 [q-fin.CP])
Abstract: We provide a martingale interpolation between measures that can be obtained by solving a Sinkhorn like system analogous to the one used in Entropic Optimal Transport.
translated_title: 保度量幂丁格鲁沉降算法
translated_abstract: 我们提供了一种保度量幂插值方法，该方法通过解决类似于熵最优输运中使用的Sinkhorn系统来获得的测度之间的插值。
tldr: 本文提供了一种保度量幂插值方法，可以通过类似于熵最优输运中使用的Sinkhorn系统来获得测度之间的插值。
en_tdlr: The paper presents a measure-preserving martingale interpolation method, which obtains interpolation between measures by solving a Sinkhorn-like system similar to the one used in Entropic Optimal Transport.
